summary: OMELET PDP(pick up and drop off) API
description: Solves the pick-up and drop-off problem (PDP) to minimize total objective cost. Supports up to 500 visit pairs and a time limit of 120 seconds for optimization.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description:
Specifies the expected response media type and API version.
Must be "application/vnd.omelet.v2+json" to indicate version 2 of the OMELET Vehicle Routing API.

VersionedJSON.summary: Use v2 of OMELET JSON API
